item.title: SPRINT 8
item.description: What is SPRINT 8?? Issues with Traditional Cardio and Dieting Long Duration, Slow, Steady State Cardio Dieting for Weight Loss (Heavy Caloric Restriction) Critical Components of any Training Program How SPRINT 8 Uses this Information Sprint Intensity vs.Â Steady State Cardio SPRINT 8 Benchmarks Benefits Short Term Long Term How to do It! Format Exercise Selection Nutrition Other Considerations SPRINT 8 is a sprint style, interval-based cardio workout created by Coach Phil Campbell.

item.title: Endgame
item.description: Week 1 Monday: Compound Lower Body Tuesday: Compound Upper Body Wednesday: Sprint/Core Thursday: Uni-Lateral Lower Body Friday: Uni-Lateral Upper Body Saturday: Multifunctional Week 2 Monday: Compound Lower Body Tuesday: Compound Upper Body Wednesday: Sprint/Core Thursday: Uni-Lateral Lower Body Friday: Uni-Lateral Upper Body Saturday: Multifunctional Complex Options I put this workout together in the summer of 2019. At its core it is an upper/lower split.
